text:
Press the Smart button in left bottom corner on the screen to open the main menu.
In the main menu that appears, look for the option labeled Programs and move mouse cursor over it.
After submenu is appeared move click on option I'm the Bat_an!.
After window will be opened just click in left pane for read Welcome to out team email.

Press the `Smart` button in left bottom corner on the screen to open the main menu. In the main menu that appears, look for the option labeled `Programs` and move mouse cursor over it. After submenu is appeared move click on option `IRina Communicator`. After window will be opened click on group `Fun Room` left part of window and select any of the suggested answer options in the right part of the window.

Press the `Smart` button in left bottom corner on the screen to open the main menu. In the main menu that appears, look for the option labeled `Programs` and move mouse cursor over it. After submenu is appeared move click on option `RSS Reader`. After window will be opened click on group `People` left part of window, select section `Local news` below selected group.

Press the `Smart` button in left bottom corner on the screen to open the main menu. In the main menu that appears, look for the option labeled `Programs` and move mouse cursor over it. After submenu is appeared move click on option `TerraMap`.
